text: Novy Mir () is a rural locality (a village) in Miyakibashevsky Selsoviet, Miyakinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 304 as of 2010. There are 6 streets. == Geography == It is located 23 km from Kirgiz-Miyaki, 20 km from Anyasevo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Miyakinsky District
title: Novy Mir, Miyakinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
